summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Andover Street, from 24th Avenue South to Empire Way; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8218 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
